name: Frameland: A Binary Tale
storyline:
Eleven years ago, an incident changed the world of Condorra forever.

Ravaging swarms of machines drove humanity to the edge of extinction. But the struggle for survival brings out the best in some, while others profit from a world that’s been turned upside-down.

It’s this cold and uncompromising place that Ryiu wakes up in, transported from his quaint little hometown of Hammertal by some mysterious force. Condorra is foreign to Ryiu, and he has no recollection of the events that transpired.

Luckily, there are allies to be found, allies that might have answers for about what happened. But some people stop at nothing to keep the truth hidden. What will it take for Ryiu to make his way back home?
summary: Frameland is a retro inspired RPG brought into the modern age. The story is not about you. You are just in it.
